name: Backyard Blast
description:
Meet Ringo the corgi and his lovable hamster friend, Mocha!

Pop, collect, blend, and eat your way through this collapse puzzle adventure with these two adorable characters.

Satisfy Ringo's love for fruits and Mocha's appetite for cheese by clearing way for Mocha to munch on them irresistible cheeses.

Blast through this puzzle by matching two or more blocks of the same color. Combine more blocks to create
special blocks to achieve higher scores and clear levels more easily. But don't get caught up with just popping
fruits. There's a mission at each level and the moves are limited, so players beware!

Play alone with Ringo or compete with your friends to see who has the best score in the game's leaderboard.

Backyard Blast features:
● Simple and fun game play: Match two or more blocks of same color
● A mix of objects and obstacles to make the game fun yet challenging
● Ever expanding levels and missions
● Play daily and be rewarded
● Use thunder hammers, missile forks, angry bombs, and other boosters to help Ringo out
● Play and compete with your Facebook friends
● Play anytime and anywhere! Even when you're offline

Backyard Blast is free to play, however, some in-game items will require real money for payment.
